Hero.text: We stand out in Web & Mobile Development with innovative apps and diverse projects, emphasizing modern technology and creativity.

Unique.title:
What makes 
 us unique
Unique.text: At outofplace.space, we focus on continuous development. As pioneers, we go beyond the initial concept, creating new ideas and successfully implementing them.
Unique.description: We're a teen duo, aged 15 and 16, dedicated to constant growth. Despite our youth, we strive to continually improve our skills, explore new frontiers, and create innovative solutions.

Services.brandImageText: Working on creating and maintaining a positive and attractive brand image for the client
Services.positioningText: Strategically positioning the client's company in the market for better visibility and recognition
Services.brandBuildingText: Developing and implementing consistent actions to build a cohesive brand identity and message

Experience.notice: Your brand is not getting noticed
Experience.noticetext: Don't worry, you're not alone. And it's not your fault: it's just the fact that the digital market is too crowded and it's difficult for your audience to navigate through the noise, let alone make a distinction between you and your number one competitor.
Experience.eye: Catch the eye of your next customer
Experience.catchtext: We enhance your brand's visibility and uniqueness through clear positioning, consistent representation, and delivering standout content and products that captivate your potential customers.

Contact.title: Contact us
Contact.fill: Fill in the form and we will contact you within 24 hours. We can't wait to start working with you!
Contact.text: Tell us few words about your project
Contact.agree: I agree to receive commercial information at the e-mail address provided to outofplace
Contact.nameMinLength: Name must be at least 3 characters.
Contact.nameMaxLength: Name must be less than 50 characters.
Contact.lastNameMinLength: Last Name must be at least 3 characters.
Contact.lastNameMaxLength: Last Name must be less than 50 characters.
Contact.emailMinLength: Email must be at least 5 characters.
Contact.emailMaxLength: Email must be less than 50 characters.
Contact.messageMinLength: Message must be at least 12 characters.
Contact.messageMaxLength: Message must be less than 5000 characters.

Thanks.title: Thank you for your trust
Thanks.text: We will respond to your inquiry within 48 hours
